description.text:
We should $(b;spring)visit$() our Court first! 
You already seen the $(b;summer)Summer Court$()...and besides we are wanted Honey Thieves now! We can't show our faces there!

The $(b;spring)Blossoming Wealds$() are so pretty, so many flowers and creatures!
Let's go! I'll introduce you to my favorite sheep friends?
Hmm....ow...I knew what a sheep was! I just wanted to see if would make it fly!
And you did, so I knew we would be bestest friends!
